arts.ttl: Haaland fires Man City to victory against Everton
arts.sum: Erling Haaland scores twice as Manchester City beat Everton to move up to second in the table.

arts.ttl: Everton put on a 'good show' and 'challenged' Man City - Moyes
arts.sum: Everton boss David Moyes says his side put on a "really good show" and "challenged" Manchester City despite losing 2-0 in the Premier League at the Etihad Stadium.

arts.ttl: He can‚Äôt stop scoring! Haaland saves the day for Man City as Pep‚Äôs men edge past Everton
arts.sum: Erling Haaland continues his remarkable scoring streak after netting a brace to help Manchester City secure a 2-0 Premier League win over Everton at the Etihad Stadium on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: (Opinion) Forget Haaland, Man City player who lost possession 16 times vs Everton actually ran the show
Manchester City 2 Everton 0: City player ratings from the Etihad.
arts.sum: Erling Haaland won the game for City, but Phil Foden, Nico O‚ÄôReilly and Nico all put in quality displays for their team. Pep Guardiola‚Äôs side had to work for the three points, as Everton put in a determined display until Erling Haaland broke the game open.

arts.ttl: Manchester City‚Äôs unstoppable Erling Haaland downs Everton with double
arts.athr: Jamie Jackson at the Etihad Stadium
arts.sum: Erling Haaland‚Äôs double seized the points, took him to 24 goals in 13 games in all competitions, and kept Tottenham as the only foes the uber-striker has failed to score against this season. The 25-year-old‚Äôs finishes ‚Äì on 58 and 63 minutes ‚Äì shredded David Moyes‚Äô visitors in two high-quality moments that decorated a generally middling affair. Without the injured Rodri and the departed Kevin De Bruyne, this Guardiola iteration does not purr along like his finest ones have. Jack Grealish was not on the sward for Everton, because of the parent-club rule, and City‚Äôs manager may ponder the wisdom of allowing the forward‚Äôs nous and class to be loaned away. arts.sum: Haaland has 23 goals in 13 games for club and country this season.

arts.ttl: Forget Haaland, Man City Star Was 'Sensational' in 'New Role' vs Everton
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola asked key man to try something new vs Everton, and it was sensational

arts.ttl: Manchester City 2 Everton 0: Match report from the Etihad.
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola‚Äôs side have stretched their unbeaten run to eight matches after a second half Erling Haaland brace decided today‚Äôs game. Haaland laid the ball off for Reijnders, who played in Jeremy Doku, who fired in a tame shot that Jordan Pickford saved.
